resources.string: select first language (asking language) and second language (answering language) for the quiz

select from saved filters groups

every filterType group must achieves all its filterTypes, you can add new filterTypes, add filterTypes from templates, edit or remove them, as one filterType group is achieved, then the word is belong to quiz regardless to other groups…

every filter contains only one constrain that is added to filter groups…
